thread.title: Future Reveals "HNDRXX" Tracklist Featuring Rihanna & The Weeknd
thread.title_full: Future Reveals "HNDRXX" Tracklist Featuring Rihanna & The Weeknd

author: Trevor Smith
title: Future Reveals "HNDRXX" Tracklist Featuring Rihanna & The Weeknd
text:
Home > Music > Future Reveals "HNDRXX" Tracklist Featuring Rihanna & The Weeknd Future Reveals "HNDRXX" Tracklist Featuring Rihanna & The Weeknd 1 0 Posted by Trevor Smith  25pm Future's second album in two weeks drops this Friday. 
Future has shared the tracklist for HNDRXX , his newly announced project that is set to be released this Friday, February 24th. As the rapper hinted Wednesday morning , The Weeknd and Rihanna will appear on the project. A post shared by Future Hendrix (@future) on Feb 22, 2017 at 12:51pm PST 
HNDRXX will be Future's second album released in two weeks, following his self-titled project which dropped last Friday. He describes the upcoming effort as "The album I always wanted to make."Future previously worked with The Weeknd on "Low Life" and "All I Know" in 2016. He was featured on Rihanna's 2012 single "Lov Song" and co-wrote "Nothing Is Promised," her 2016 collaboration with Mike WiLL Made It . 
Like FUTURE , HNDRXX will be 17 tracks in length. Future released the video for "Draco" today. Watch it below. < class="robots-nocontent" rel=""> Feb 22, 2017 at 04:25pm 6 Views 
Mike WiLL Made-It appears to be angling for a March release of "Ransom 2." Future's second album in two weeks drops this Friday. 
Future has shared the tracklist for HNDRXX , his newly announced project that is set to be released this Friday, February 24th. As the rapper hinted Wednesday morning , The Weeknd and Rihanna will appear on the project. A post shared by Future Hendrix (@future) on Feb 22, 2017 at 12:51pm PST 
HNDRXX will be Future's second album released in two weeks, following his self-titled project which dropped last Friday. He describes the upcoming effort as "The album I always wanted to make."Future previously worked with The Weeknd on "Low Life" and "All I Know" in 2016. He was featured on Rihanna's 2012 single "Lov Song" and co-wrote "Nothing Is Promised," her 2016 collaboration with Mike WiLL Made It . 
Like FUTURE , HNDRXX will be 17 tracks in length. Future released the video for "Draco" today. Watch it below.
